item.title: Music 🎧
item.description: I listen to music day in and out. I feel it is TOO MUCH! When I am in party mood or with my friends I listen to, [[Music#Punjabi|Punjabi]] When I am working I listen to [[public/Music#White Noise 🤍]]

item.title: Podcasts 🎧
item.description: Week of 11th June Practical AI: Machine Learning, Data Science - Creating instruction tuned models Great chat contains helpful insights into how you can instruction tune a model.

item.title: Who dis?
item.description: Hello, Rhitik here! 👋🏼 First things first, I use avatars for identity. Let me put a face to the name. Here is Rhitik, with Hritik Roshan,
